item.description: To solve this problem, we can use the concept of molality, which is a measure of the concentration of a solute in a solvent. The molality of a solution is defined as the number of moles of solute per kilogram of solvent. In this case, the molality of the solution is 0.1 mol/1.8 kg = 0.0556 mol/kg.
